body_html:
rerunning cmake shouldn't take very long if all the relevant variables are cached. So, ideally looking into caching all relevant cmake variables has to be done.
Anders' solution looks reasonable as well, if we dont need to spend too much time on this.

body:
rerunning cmake shouldn't take very long if all the relevant variables are cached. So, ideally looking into caching all relevant cmake variables has to be done.
Anders' solution looks reasonable as well, if we dont need to spend too much time on this.
